actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide that institutions of higher education which have withdrawn from the ROTC program are not disqualified, solely because of such withdrawal, from providing education and training to members of the Armed Forces and employees of the military department.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to take such action as may be necessary to insure that no college or university shall be disqualified as an institution where members of the Armed Forces or employees of the military department may receive education and training solely because such college or university has withdrawn from the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program.

titles.title: A bill to provide that institutions of higher education which have withdrawn from the ROTC program are not disqualified, solely because of such withdrawal, from providing education and training to members of the Armed Forces and employees of the military department.
